name: use-embeddings-extension
description: Browser extension to generate text embeddings using Universal Sentence Encoder

scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist/src && cp src/popup.html dist/src/ && cp manifest.json dist
scripts.build: parcel build src/service_worker.js src/popup.js --dist-dir dist/src/ && npm run copy
scripts.watch: parcel watch src/service_worker.js src/popup.js --dist-dir dist/src/ & npm run copy
scripts.dev: npm run copy && npm run watch
